title: Plotting in R
text:
How to make a plot


Code
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(factor(cyl), mpg)) +
  geom_boxplot()





If this works, itâ€™s proof that the github actions workflow (.github/workflows/quarto-publish.yml) activated the conda environment (environment.yml).
